task.title: Settings
task.shortdesc: A settings screen will provide a central place for the user to modify settings related to the add-in.

step.cmd: Click in the navigator, and select Contacts.
In the Search for contacts field, enter the full name or initial part of the person's name and click Search.
When the name that you want to add displays in the Search results, click the + icon.
Select the group to add the contact to in the Add to group field, and then click Add.

postreq.p:
To remove a name from your contact list, select it and then click
Remove from Contact List . Click Remove to confirm the removal.
